reviewText: Got this for my Boyfriend for Christmas and he loved it :) Good condition, no scratches
my favorite band. would like to be able to watch earlier videos but this is great.
Most excellent collection of Metallica videos. Great DolbyDigital sound.
Good vids and they need to be on Amazon video!
Sound quality was okay, certainly beats the other Amazon posting that is charging thee times as much.
I bought this specifically because it's mixed in 5.1, I don't care about the videos themselves. Sounds great on my system!

Im a big Metallica fan but gave it a 3 cause of the Load reload and St. anger vids. Got it for the 2 for One VHS add on. Still enjoy watching the other vids. I can appreciate the stuff they did after the Black album. But not my cup of tea.
It was a gift for my son who lost his collection during the move. There will be more order later on
Great, I am pretty much satisfied with anything Metallica puts out
Fantastic as anything Metallica is naturally perfect.
